title: NTI AI Graduate Certification
description: NTI / Huawei Egyptian Talent Academy Track in Artificial Intelligence with 80 comprehensive hours of training and achieved an outstanding score of 98%.

title: HCIA Certification
description: Certified in Huawei's AI and cloud computing fundamentals, demonstrating comprehensive expertise in enterprise-level artificial intelligence solutions and infrastructure.

title: DEPI Front End Graduate Certification
description: Successfully achieving excellence in the Digital Egypt Pioneers Program (Software Development – Frontend Developer) from April to October 2024.

title: Business English Track
issuer: Ministry of Communications and Information Technology (MCIT) – Digital Egypt Pioneers
description: Successfully completed the Business English Track (Round 1) offered by OTO Courses under the sponsorship of the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology.

title: Machine Learning Specialization
description: Comprehensive study and practical implementation of machine learning algorithms including regression, classification, and clustering techniques.

title: Deep Learning with PyTorch
description: Advanced deep learning training with PyTorch framework, including neural networks, CNNs, and computer vision applications.

title: Computer Vision Fundamentals
description: Image processing, object detection, and classification using OpenCV and deep learning architectures like YOLO and MobileNet.

title: Data Science with Python
description: Data analysis and visualization using Python, Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib for extracting insights from complex datasets.
